name: T - Carlos
_source: speak;Emma; Carlos, can you believe how the sea shines?{w} Isn't it beautiful?
speak;Carlos; The salty smell of the sea isn't particularly for me,{w} but I guess I can see how it could appeal to someone like you.
speak;Emma; Someone{tgm}...{tgm}like me?{w} What do you mean?
speak;Carlos; You're{tgm}...{tgm}how do I say this in a gentle way?{w} Ah, wait, I've got it.{w} You're simple.{w} From what I can see,{w} it doesn't take much to impress you.
speak;Emma; Hey, that's mean!{w} I've never even seen the ocean before!
speak;Carlos; You've <bconvo>never</> seen the ocean?{w} Have you never left your village or something?
speak;Emma; You'll laugh at this, actually{tgm}...
speak;Carlos; Oh heavens above{tgm}...{tgm}{w} How did Sarah choose you to be a secondhand leader?{w} I've got my issues with Kate,{w} but at least she didn't delegate leadership to a newborn{tgm}...
speak;Carlos; That remains to be seen.
speak;Emma; To be proven wrong, you mean.
